subject: Investing
title: Dividend ETFs for Easy Diversification
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Dividend ETFs for Easy Diversification.

hook.text: One ETF purchase gave an investor instant exposure to 400 dividend-paying stocks for a fee under 0.10%.

buildup.text: Dividend ETFs bundle hundreds of dividend stocks into a single fund that trades like a stock.

discovery.text: Popular options include VYM for high yield, SCHD for dividend growth, and DGRO for a blend of both.

twist.text: ETFs can't customize around your tax situation or exclude stocks you dislike. Individual stocks offer more control.

climax.text: For most investors, a core dividend ETF plus a few individual picks combines simplicity with personalization.

punchline.text: Dividend ETFs are the easiest on-ramp to passive income investing.

quiz.question: What is a key advantage of dividend ETFs?
options: Instant diversification across many dividend stocks
